1

ICY NEEDLES OF water bombarded [my]46-god overheated skin , the sting chasing away the clinging shadows of a nightmare [I]46-god could n’t fully remember .

Closing [my]46-god eyes , [I]46-god stepped deeper into the spray , willing the lingering fear and nausea to circle the drain at [my]46-god feet . A shiver racked [me]46-god , and [my]46-god thoughts shifted to [[my]46-god wife]252-anne . [[My]46-god angel who slept peacefully in [the apartment next door]254-the apartment next door]253-my angel who slept peacefully in the apartment next door . [I]46-god wanted [her]252-anne urgently , wanted to lose [myself]46-god in [her]252-anne , and hated that [I]46-god could n’t . Could n’t hold [her]252-anne close . Could n’t pull [her]252-anne lush body under [mine]46-god and sink into it , letting [her]252-anne touch chase the memories away .

“ Fuck . ”[46-god] [I]46-god placed [my]46-god palms flat against the cool tile and absorbed the chill of the punishing deluge into [my]46-god bones . [I]46-god was [a selfish asshole]255-a selfish asshole .

If [I]46-god ’d been [a better man]256-a better man , [I]46-god would ’ve walked away from [Eva]49-eva Cross the moment [I]46-god saw [her]49-eva .

Instead , [I]46-god ’d made [her]49-eva [[my]46-god wife]49-eva . And [I]46-god wanted the news of [our]257-our marriage broadcast via every medium known to [man]258-man , rather than hidden away as a secret between less than [a handful of [people]260-people]259-a handful of people . Worse , since [I]46-god had no intention of letting [her]49-eva go , [I]46-god would have to find a way to make up for the fact that [I]46-god was such a fucking mess [we]257-our could n’t even sleep in [the same room]261-the same room together .

[I]46-god lathered , quickly washing away the sticky sweat [I]46-god ’d woken up in . Within minutes [I]46-god was heading out to [the bedroom]262-the bedroom , where [I]46-god pulled on a pair of sweats before heading to [[my]46-god home office]263-my home office . It was just barely seven in the morning .

[I]46-god ’d left [the apartment]262-the bedroom [Eva]49-eva shared with [[her]49-eva best friend]264-her best friend , [Cary Taylor]483-cary , only a couple of hours earlier , wanting to give [her]49-eva time to catch a few hours of sleep before [she]49-eva headed into work . [We]257-our had been at [each other]265-each other all night , [both of [us]257-our]266-both of us too needy and greedy . But there ’d been something else , too . An urgency on [Eva]49-eva ’s part that gnawed at [me]46-god and left [me]46-god uneasy .

Something was bothering [[my]46-god wife]252-anne .

[My]46-god gaze drifted to the window and its view of [Manhattan]1-new york beyond [it]1-new york , then settled on the empty wall where photos of [her]252-anne and [us]257-our hung in the same space in [[my]46-god penthouse office]268-my penthouse office in [[our]257-our home on [Fifth Avenue]2-fifth avenue]269-our home on fifth avenue . [I]46-god could imagine the collage clearly , having spent countless hours studying it over the last few months . Looking out at [the city]1-new york had once been the way [I]46-god encapsulated [[my]46-god world]270-my world . Now , [I]46-god accomplished that by looking at [Eva]49-eva .

[I]46-god sat at [my]46-god desk and woke [my]46-god computer with a shake of the mouse , taking a deep slow breath as [[my]46-god wife]252-anne ’s face filled [my]46-god monitor . [She]252-anne wore no makeup in the photo that was [my]46-god desktop wallpaper , and a smattering of light freckles on [her]252-anne nose made [her]252-anne appear younger than [her]252-anne twenty - four years . [My]46-god gaze slid over [her]252-anne features — the curve of [her]252-anne brows , the brightness of [her]252-anne gray eyes , the fullness of [her]252-anne lips . In the moments when [I]46-god let [myself]46-god think of it , [I]46-god could almost feel those lips against [my]46-god skin . [Her]252-anne kisses were benedictions , promises from [my]46-god angel that made [my]46-god life worth living .

With a determined exhalation , [I]46-god picked up the phone and speed - dialed [Raúl Huerta]46-god . Despite the earliness of the hour , [he]46-god answered swiftly and alertly .

“ [Mrs. Cross]339-gideon and [Cary Taylor]483-cary are heading to [San Diego]3-san diego today , ”[46-god] [I]46-god said , [my]46-god hand curling into a fist at the thought . [I]46-god did n’t have to say more .

“ Got it . ”[46-god]

“ [I]46-god want a recent photo of [Anne Lucas]252-anne and a detailed rundown of where [she]49-eva was last night on [my]46-god desk by noon . ”[46-god]

“ At the latest , ”[46-god] [he]46-god affirmed .

[I]46-god hung up and stared at [Eva]49-eva ’s captivatingly beautiful face . [I]46-god ’d caught [her]49-eva in a happy , unguarded moment , a state of being [I]46-god was determined to keep [her]49-eva in for the rest of [her]49-eva life . Soon .

Opening [my]46-god inbox , [I]46-god started sifting through [my]46-god e - mails , drafting quick answers when required and working [my]46-god way toward the subject line that had caught [my]46-god eye the moment [my]46-god e - mail opened .

[I]46-god felt [Eva]49-eva before [I]46-god saw [her]49-eva .

[I]46-god lifted [my]46-god head and [my]46-god keystrokes slowed . A sudden rush of desire soothed the agitation [I]46-god felt whenever [I]46-god was n’t with [her]49-eva .

[I]46-god leaned back to better appreciate the view . “ [You]49-eva ’re up early , [angel]49-eva . ”[46-god]
